title: Looking for players to be in a team or a team to play in
body:
im silver/gold just wanting to be part of a team have fun plz msg me if interested

My ign is CaringSupport

replies.body: My friends are busy half the time so yeah I'd be interested, ign Pentakiruuu plat 1 last season.
I'll join this if you guys want, could probably find a few people from our friends list so we have 5 or more. I play any role :)
Hiii :) If you guys need a support/ mid/ adc for your team I was silver 1 last season and am also looking for a team. My in game name is SnowWhiteSmile.

Im keen to be apart of this I main Jng/ADC i was Silver 3 preseason but now I have been placed in Bronze 5 soon to be back in Silver.

Add me if you'd like to chat ING: RedRain

if ur making a team ill be happy to join been looking for one myself i was silver 2 preseason but got into b2 from prov but will be getting back to silver soon. if your interested my ign is MattLife GG
cheers
